name: Dual energy
description:
The game about an astronaut went to a strange planet wearing a robotic suit and his main reason was to study weird energy a black and white energy that destroy each other when they are close to each other, and he start to charge his suit with this energy to figure out what is behind it.

I'm sorry for the weak anmation I'm not an artist and I tried my best to come up with some art for the game because I was going solo and also didn't have time to implement  sound effect and music, hope you like it.
